titleStmt.title: The veray trew history of the valiau[n]t knight Iaso[n] how he conquerd or wan the golden fles, by the counsel of Medea and of many othre victoryouse and wondrefull actis and dedys that he dyde by his prowesse and cheualrye in his tyme
Jason et Medée. English
titleStmt.author: Lefèvre, Raoul, fl. 1460.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Prentyd by me Gerard Leeu in the towne of Andewarpe,
publicationStmt.date: In the yere of oure lord, M.CCCC. Fowre skore and twelve, [and] fynysshed the secunde day of Iuyne [1492]]

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Caxton, of: Le Fefèvre, Raoul. Jason et Medée.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
